A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sure it has some weak spots. But it's also engaging\, thrilling\, thought-provoking\, canon-building\, and worthy of watching time and time again. I think this movie will stand up to the test of time like the best. I plan to see it at least 2 more time in theaters before the run is done and to buy it as soon as it is released on DVD. It challenges our understanding of the characters in a new\, excellent way.
